title: How to Fold a Napkin As a Placemat

steps.headline: Lay the square napkin on the table.
Fold each of its corners to the middle.
steps.description: You will have four triangles, the tips meeting in the center when done.

steps.headline: Turn the napkin over.
steps.description: To do this, place your hand onto the middle to catch the four triangle tips with your fingers, to prevent them from undoing as you turn. Quickly flip the napkin over flat.

steps.headline: Fold all four triangles into the center again.
One more time, carefully flip over the napkin.
Fold each center corner back to meet each edge corner.
steps.description: Press down to firm up the folds.

steps.headline: Place the plate in the center.
steps.description: Each of the folds should neatly site around the plate edges. Done!

text: Lay the square napkin on the table.  Fold each of its corners to the middle. You will have four triangles, the tips meeting in the center when done. Turn the napkin over. To do this, place your hand onto the middle to catch the four triangle tips with your fingers, to prevent them from undoing as you turn. Quickly flip the napkin over flat. Fold all four triangles into the center again.  One more time, carefully flip over the napkin.  Fold each center corner back to meet each edge corner. Press down to firm up the folds. Place the plate in the center. Each of the folds should neatly site around the plate edges. Done!
